languages.text: {n}Культистка раздраженно отрезает:{/n} "Не оскорбляй свои уста подобными подозрениями. Мы — не {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}ведьмы или проклятые колдуны{/g}, но верные последователи Его, награжденные за истинное служение. Это — не нечестивое псайкерство, а благословение Неумирающего, дарованное ткачам Кровавой паутины. Тонкая нить духовного родства, объединяющая судьбы Домини и их тени".

{n}She snaps in irritation,{/n} "Do not sully your lips with such suspicions. We are neither {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches nor accursed sorcerers{/g} — we are His votaries, and for our true service, we are thus rewarded. This is no profane psychic art, but the blessing of the Undying One, bestowed upon the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. A thin thread of spiritual kinship that connects the fates of the Domini with those of their shadows."
languages.original_text: {n}Культистка раздраженно отрезает:{/n} "Не оскорбляй свои уста подобными подозрениями. We are neither {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches nor accursed sorcerers{/g} — we are His votaries, and for our true service, we are thus rewarded. This is no profane psychic art, but the blessing of the Undying One, bestowed upon the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. A thin thread of spiritual kinship that connects the fates of the Domini with those of their shadows."

{n}The cultist sighs unhappily.{/n} "This is the blessing of the Undying One, bestowed upon the weavers of the Bloodspun Web. A bond that connects the Enim and their shadows. We are not witches or accursed sorcerers but His loyal disciples, rewarded for our devotion."

A thin thread of spiritual kinship that connects the fates of the Domini with those of their shadows."

We are neither witches nor accursed sorcerers — we are His loyal disciples, celebrated far and wide for our devotion."

languages.text: {n}Sie schnaubt wütend.{/n} "Befleckt Eure Lippen nicht mit solchen Verdächtigungen. Wir sind weder {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}Hexen, noch verfluchte Beschwörerinnen{/g} ... wir sind Seine Verehrer und werden für unseren treuen Dienst belohnt. Das sind keine profanen Gedankentricks, sondern der Segen des Todlosen, der den Spinnern des Blutgesponnenen Netzes gewährt wurde. Ein dünner Faden spiritueller Verwandtschaft, der das Schicksal der Domini mit dem ihrer Schatten verbindet."
languages.original_text: {n}She snaps in irritation,{/n} "Do not sully your lips with such suspicions. We are neither {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches nor accursed sorcerers{/g} — we are His votaries, and for our true service, we are thus rewarded. This is no profane psychic art, but the blessing of the Undying One, bestowed upon the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. A thin thread of spiritual kinship that connects the fates of the Domini with those of their shadows."

Ein dünner Faden spiritueller Verwandtschaft, der das Schicksal der Domini mit dem ihrer Schatten verbindet."

languages.text: {n}Chasca la lengua, irritada.{/n} «No mancille sus labios con esas sospechas. No somos ni {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}brujos ni hechiceros malditos{/g}; somos Sus devotos, y esta es la recompensa por nuestro fiel servicio. No se trata de un arte psíquico profano, sino de la bendición del Inmortal, otorgada a los tejedores de la Red Sanguinolenta. Un delgado hilo de familiaridad espiritual que conecta los destinos de los Domini con los de sus sombras».
languages.original_text: {n}She snaps in irritation,{/n} "Do not sully your lips with such suspicions. We are neither {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches nor accursed sorcerers{/g} — we are His votaries, and for our true service, we are thus rewarded. This is no profane psychic art, but the blessing of the Undying One, bestowed upon the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. A thin thread of spiritual kinship that connects the fates of the Domini with those of their shadows."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chasca la lengua, irritada.{/n} «No mancille sus labios con esas sospechas. No somos ni {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}brujos ni hechiceros malditos{/g}; somos Sus devotos, y esta es la recompensa por nuestro fiel servicio. No se trata de un arte psíquico profano, sino de la bendición del Inmortal, otorgada a los tejedores de la Red Sanguinolenta. Un delgado hilo de familiaridad espiritual que conecta los destinos de los Domini con los de sus sombras».

languages.text: {n}彼女は苛立ちから鋭く返す。{/n}「そのような疑惑で唇を汚してはなりません。我らは{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}魔女でも呪われたソーサラー{/g}でもないのです。我らは主に忠誠を誓う者であり、真の奉仕のゆえに、このように報われるのです。これは、けっして冒涜的な超能力などではなく、不死の者がブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手に授けた加護なのです。ドミンとその影たちの運命をつなぐ、精神的な結びつきの細い糸」
languages.original_text: {n}She snaps in irritation,{/n} "Do not sully your lips with such suspicions. We are neither {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches nor accursed sorcerers{/g} — we are His votaries, and for our true service, we are thus rewarded. This is no profane psychic art, but the blessing of the Undying One, bestowed upon the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. A thin thread of spiritual kinship that connects the fates of the Domini with those of their shadows."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は苛立ちから鋭く返す。{/n}「そのような疑惑で唇を汚してはなりません。我らは{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}魔女でも呪われたソーサラー{/g}でもないのです。我らは主に忠誠を誓う者であり、真の奉仕のゆえに、このように報われるのです。これは、けっして冒涜的な超能力などではなく、不死の者がブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手に授けた加護なのです。ドミンとその影たちの運命をつなぐ、精神的な結びつきの細い糸」

languages.text: {n}她恼怒地打断了你的话。{/n}“不要用这样的怀疑来玷污你的唇舌。我们{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}既不是女巫，也不是遭到诅咒的巫师{/g}。我们是祂的信徒，我们靠着虔诚的侍奉，才得到了这样的恩典。这可不是什么亵渎神明的灵能力量，而是来自不死之神的祝福，是赐予织网者的祝福。这条由精神联结的细线，会将秘者与他们影子的命运联结在一起。”
languages.original_text: {n}She snaps in irritation,{/n} "Do not sully your lips with such suspicions. We are neither {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches nor accursed sorcerers{/g} — we are His votaries, and for our true service, we are thus rewarded. This is no profane psychic art, but the blessing of the Undying One, bestowed upon the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. A thin thread of spiritual kinship that connects the fates of the Domini with those of their shadows."

traits.locale_text: {n}她恼怒地打断了你的话。{/n}“不要用这样的怀疑来玷污你的唇舌。我们{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}既不是女巫，也不是遭到诅咒的巫师{/g}。我们是祂的信徒，我们靠着虔诚的侍奉，才得到了这样的恩典。这可不是什么亵渎神明的灵能力量，而是来自不死之神的祝福，是赐予织网者的祝福。这条由精神联结的细线，会将秘者与他们影子的命运联结在一起。”

languages.text: {n}Elle aboie d'un ton agacé :{/n} « Ne souillez pas vos lèvres avec de telles suspicions. Nous ne sommes {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}ni des sorcières ni des sorciers haïs{/g}... nous sommes Ses disciples et Il nous récompense pour notre fidélité à ses œuvres. Ce n'est pas un quelconque art psychique profane, mais la bénédiction de l'Immortel, accordée aux tisseurs de la Toile de Sang. Un fil ténu de parenté spirituelle qui lie le destin des Domini à celui de leurs ombres. »
languages.original_text: {n}She snaps in irritation,{/n} "Do not sully your lips with such suspicions. We are neither {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches nor accursed sorcerers{/g} — we are His votaries, and for our true service, we are thus rewarded. This is no profane psychic art, but the blessing of the Undying One, bestowed upon the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. A thin thread of spiritual kinship that connects the fates of the Domini with those of their shadows."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, aniden huzursuzca parlıyor.{/n} "Böylesi kuşkularla sözlerine leke sürme. Bizler {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}ne cadıyız ne de lanetli sahirleriz{/g}. Biz, 'O'nun taraftarlarıyız. Salt hizmetimiz karşılığında da ödüllendiriliriz. Bu gördüğün, kâfirlik saçan bir ruhsezi sanatı değildir. Ölmeyen tarafından Kanipi Ağı dokurlarına bahşedilen bir lütuftur. Dominlerin kaderlerini gölgeleriyle bağlayan, ruhani hısımlığın temsili incecik bir ipliktir."
languages.original_text: {n}She snaps in irritation,{/n} "Do not sully your lips with such suspicions. We are neither {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerGlossary}witches nor accursed sorcerers{/g} — we are His votaries, and for our true service, we are thus rewarded. This is no profane psychic art, but the blessing of the Undying One, bestowed upon the spinners of the Bloodspun Web. A thin thread of spiritual kinship that connects the fates of the Domini with those of their shadows."
